duties_responsibilities.duty: Support Financial Advisors with day-to-day investment practice and enhance customer service level.
Act as a liaison between the registered representatives and their clients.
Answer phones, schedule appointments, and prepare materials for client meetings.
Aid in preparing client illustrations, graphs, charts, reports, etc. for presentations and appointments with clients.
Organize client events and maintain client records and retention.
Conduct proactive outreach to clients and registered representatives on time-sensitive activities.
Maintain compliance guidelines, client communication notes, and corporate training on new technologies.
Assist with weekly meetings to help maintain Advisor's Business Plan, tasks, marketing, and client communication expectations.
